allowBothFiltersConcurrently.description: Set to true if you would like to allow both filters inside the Combined Filter to be active at the same time.

suppressSynchronisation.description: Set to true to prevent the Set Filter selection from being synchronised with the results from the wrapped filter. This has no effect if allowBothFiltersConcurrently = true.

filter<br />filterFramework.description: Filter component to wrap in the Combined Filter.

filterParams.description: Custom parameters to be passed to the wrapped filter component.

floatingFilterComponent<br />floatingFil.description: Floating filter component to use for the wrapped filter.

floatingFilterComponentParams.description: Custom parameters to be passed to the floating filter component.
